A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Fate or free will? The light or the dark? These struggles play out within all of us\, force-connected\, or not. The Last Jedi capitalizes on this turmoil in true Star Wars fashion. Things are never exactly as they seem and no matter what\, there is still hope. Luke Skywalker is as flawed as ever but Mark Hammil has never been better. \nIt lost a star because of Porgs and the underutilized Chewbacca.
